Constantly using flash drives to bring support points from one machine to another is frustrating and time-consuming. To help with this problem, I developed a chipset that allows a machine to transport its support to other machines nearby without my express intervention.
高品質（chip power）的SP晶片組與普通晶片相比沒有任何更多的優勢!
Info: The actual effect of this chipset will be determined by the machine in which this chipset is installed.
Hint: Refer to "Logic Chipset" for general information on chipsets.
